## CreatePlayerOptions type

创建 Player 的配置项

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type CreatePlayerOptions = {
    container: HTMLElement;
    height: number;
    width: number;
    layout: "intrinsic" | "responsive" | "fixed" | "fill";
    objectFit?: Properties["objectFit"];
    objectPosition?: Properties["objectPosition"];
    frames: string[] | {
        total: number;
        iterator: (i: number) => string;
    };
    parallel?: boolean;
    chunkSize?: number;
    fps?: number;
    autoload?: boolean;
    lazyload?: boolean;
    autoplay?: boolean;
    loop?: boolean;
    yoyo?: boolean;
};
```
